name: Pinball Roulette
description:
Classic Pinball with overly bombastic effects and action with a roulette twist. A random event occurs every 30 seconds so watch out!

Controls Scheme:
Left/Right Ctrl - Left/Right Flippers
Spacebar Hold/Realse - Charge Plunger
Left/Right Arrow keys - Tilts Machine Left/Right (Only 3 per game)
Escape - Returns to main menu
